memberdef.name: LV_LABEL_HINT_UPDATE_TH
memberdef.initializer: 1024 /*Update the "hint" if the label's y coordinates have changed more then this*/

detaileddescription.para:
Convert a hexadecimal characters to a number (0..15)
hex
Pointer to a hexadecimal character (0..9, A..F)
the numerical value of hex or 0 on error

memberdef.argsstring: (const lv_area_t *coords, const lv_area_t *mask, const lv_style_t *style, lv_opa_t opa_scale, const char *txt, lv_txt_flag_t flag, lv_point_t *offset, uint16_t sel_start, uint16_t sel_end, lv_draw_label_hint_t *hint)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_label

detaileddescription.para:
Write a text
coords
coordinates of the label
mask
the label will be drawn only in this area
style
pointer to a style
opa_scale
scale down all opacities by the factor
txt
0 terminated text to write
flag
settings for the text from 'txt_flag_t' enum
offset
text offset in x and y direction (NULL if unused)
sel_start
start index of selected area (LV_LABEL_TXT_SEL_OFF if none)
sel_end
end index of selected area (LV_LABEL_TXT_SEL_OFF if none)
